Naruto performs a [[Rasengan]] while in [[Baryon Mode]].

== Trivia ==
* When Naruto performs a Baryon Rasengan in the anime he maintains composure and simply calls the jutsu a "Rasengan" in a calm voice. It was later named Baryon Rasengan in the mobile game ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Voltage]]''. A more powerful version based on the anime fight choreography also appears in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections]]'' named [[Baryon Rasengan: Heaven Pierce]].
